recipes.ingredients: bread(of your choice), sliced honey ham, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise
recipes.instructions: 1. Place two slices of bread out and spread mayonnaise on one sliced. 2.Add 3 slices of ham. 3.Add 2 slices of cheddar cheese. 4.Combine halves and enjoy
1. Pour cereal into bowl 2.Add milk and enjoy

1. Place two slices of bread out and spread butter on inside of both slices. 2.Add 3 slices of cheese. 3.Combine halves and spread mayonnaise on both outside slices. 4.Cook on skillet on mediium for 5-6 min on each side. 5.Let cool and enjoy.
1. Spread peanut butter on one slice of bread. 2. Spread jelly on another slice. 3. Combine slices and enjoy.
